dict.acceptation: …后的；（表示时间）在…以后；（表示位置、顺序）在…后面；

sent.orig: They are after fame after position and after money.
sent.trans: 他们追求名誉、地位和金钱。

sent.orig: We searched village after village, ruin after ruin, country after country, and always we found nothing.
sent.trans: 我们找寻了一个村庄又一个村庄，一个废墟又一个废墟，一个国家又一个国家，却什么也找不到。

sent.orig: We repeat this routine day after day, month after month, year after year.
sent.trans: 我们日复一日地重复这些例行的事，月复一月，年复一年。

sent.orig: After I after 500 meters quickly, examine minutely breathlessly: "What job to produce after all?"
sent.trans: 我快速的追了五百公尺以后，气喘吁吁的追问：“到底发生了什么事？”

sent.orig: Three comes after one, five comes after three, and so on, what's after nine?
sent.trans: 一后面是三，三后面是五，以此类推，九后面应该是几？
